text: My Dear Rosy is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by PK Krishnan, starring Captain Raju and Asha in the lead roles. http://www.malayalamcinema.com/userreview_my-dear-rosy-.htm ==Cast== * Captain Raju as Vijay * Prathapachandran as Fernandez * Asha as Rosy * Kuthiravattam Pappu as Doctor *Sathaar as James *Ravi Menon as Dr Aravind *Santhakumari as Lakshmiyamma *Bheeman Raghu as Sekhar *Mala Aravindan as George *Sugandi as Vimala ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: My Dear Rosy
